Ingredients.1: 2 pounds yams, peeled and cut into 1 inch pieces

Ingredients.3: 5 tablespoons brown sugar, divided, or more to taste

Directions.1: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil. Add yams and cook, stirring occasionally, until tender, 12 to 15 minutes.

Directions.2: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).

Directions.3: Drain and transfer to a bowl with butter, 4 tablespoons brown sugar, cream, and 1/2 teaspoon cinnamon. Mash until all ingredients are incorporated and butter is melted. Transfer to a casserole dish and sprinkle with remaining brown sugar and cinnamon. Arrange pecans and marshmallows over the top.

Directions.4: Bake in the preheated oven for 20 minutes.
